nodes.id: 中国地震局发展研究中心

zh-cn: 中国地震局发展研究中心
en: Development Research Center of China Earthquake Administration

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区三里河路56号
location.en: No. 56, Sanlihe Road, Xicheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国地震局直属事业单位，负责全国地震防灾发展战略与规划研究工作。
description.en: A public institution directly under the China Earthquake Administration, responsible for research on national earthquake disaster prevention development strategies and plans.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院直属事业单位，是全国防震减灾工作的主管部门。
description.en: A public institution directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, and the competent department for national earthquake prevention and disaster reduction work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国地震局发展研究中心主任。
description.en: Chinese political figure, current Director of the Development Research Center of the China Earthquake Administration.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国地震局发展研究中心副主任。
description.en: Chinese political figure, current Deputy Director of the Development Research Center of the China Earthquake Administration.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国地震局发展研究中心副主任、纪委书记。
description.en: Chinese political figure, current Deputy Director and Secretary of the Discipline Inspection Commission of the Development Research Center of the China Earthquake Administration.

nodes.id: 中国地震局地壳运动监测工程研究中心

zh-cn: 中国地震局地壳运动监测工程研究中心
地壳运动监测工程研究中心
en: Crustal Movement Monitoring Engineering Research Center of China Earthquake Administration

description.zh-cn: 中国地震局发展研究中心的前身机构。
description.en: The predecessor organization of the Development Research Center of the China Earthquake Administration.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中国地震局副局长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, then Deputy Director of the China Earthquake Administration.

nodes.id: 中国地震局震害防御司

zh-cn: 中国地震局震害防御司
en: Department of Earthquake Damage Prevention, China Earthquake Administration

description.en: An internal department of the China Earthquake Administration.

nodes.id: 中国地震局监测预报司

zh-cn: 中国地震局监测预报司
en: Department of Monitoring and Forecasting, China Earthquake Administration

description.en: An internal department of the China Earthquake Administration.

relationships.source: 中国地震局发展研究中心

description.zh-cn: 中国地震局发展研究中心是中国地震局的直属事业单位。
description.en: The Development Research Center of the China Earthquake Administration is a public institution directly under the China Earthquake Administration.

relationships.target: 中国地震局发展研究中心

description.zh-cn: 担任中国地震局发展研究中心主任。
description.en: Serves as the Director of the Development Research Center of the China Earthquake Administration.

relationships.target: 中国地震局发展研究中心

description.zh-cn: 担任中国地震局发展研究中心副主任。
description.en: Serves as the Deputy Director of the Development Research Center of the China Earthquake Administration.

relationships.target: 中国地震局发展研究中心

position.en: Deputy Director, Secretary of the Discipline Inspection Commission

description.zh-cn: 担任中国地震局发展研究中心副主任、纪委书记。
description.en: Serves as the Deputy Director and Secretary of the Discipline Inspection Commission of the Development Research Center of the China Earthquake Administration.

relationships.target: 中国地震局发展研究中心

description.zh-cn: 根据中国地震局的决定，调整组建了中国地震局发展研究中心。
description.en: Based on the decision of the China Earthquake Administration, the Development Research Center of the China Earthquake Administration was reorganized and established.

relationships.target: 中国地震局地壳运动监测工程研究中心

description.zh-cn: 根据中国地震局的决定，不再保留地壳运动监测工程研究中心。
description.en: Based on the decision of the China Earthquake Administration, the Crustal Movement Monitoring Engineering Research Center was abolished.

relationships.source: 中国地震局地壳运动监测工程研究中心
relationships.target: 中国地震局发展研究中心

description.zh-cn: 中国地震局发展研究中心由中国地震局地壳运动监测工程研究中心调整组建而来，是其后继机构。
description.en: The Development Research Center of the China Earthquake Administration was formed by reorganizing the Crustal Movement Monitoring Engineering Research Center, serving as its successor organization.

description.zh-cn: 2018年1月时任中国地震局副局长。
description.en: Served as Deputy Director of the China Earthquake Administration as of January 2018.

relationships.target: 中国地震局发展研究中心

description.zh-cn: 主持召开强震动观测和地壳运动观测业务改革工作会议，推动相关改革工作的落实。
description.en: Chaired a work conference on the reform of strong-motion observation and crustal movement observation services, promoting the implementation of related reforms.

relationships.source: 中国地震局发展研究中心

description.zh-cn: 该中心的办公地址位于北京市。
description.en: The office of this center is located in Beijing.
